agent_registration_instruction: Please register Hoppscotch Agent with your web client to continue.
agent_enter_otp_instruction: Please enter the verification code generated by Hoppscotch Agent and complete the registration
agent_not_running: The Hoppscotch Agent is not running. Please start the agent and click 'Retry'.
agent_proxy_capabilities: Hoppscotch Agent supports HTTP/HTTPS/SOCKS proxies along with NTLM and Basic Auth in those proxies. Include the username and password for the proxy authentication in the URL itself.
app_developer_option_description: Developer tools which helps in development and maintenance of Hoppscotch.
app_invite_description: Hoppscotch is an open source API development ecosystem. We designed a simple and intuitive interface for creating and managing your APIs. Hoppscotch is a tool that helps you build, test, document and share your APIs.
app_new_version_found: New version found. Refresh to update.
app_social_description: Follow us on social media to stay updated with the latest news, updates and releases.
